stsjorbsmod:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

stsjorbsmod:ArcaneWeaponPower.NAME: Arcane Weapon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, attack a random enemy for #b

stsjorbsmod:BlackTentaclesPower.NAME: Black Tentacles
DESCRIPTIONS: Attacks with random targets target this enemy for #b

stsjorbsmod:CoilPower.NAME: Coil
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage to all enemies and lose all Coil.

stsjorbsmod:PrestidigitationPower.NAME: Prestidigitation
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, apply #b1 Weak or #b1 Vulnerable to a random enemy #b

stsjorbsmod:SnappedPower.NAME: Snapped
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot remember any memories or clarities.

stsjorbsmod:DiligenceMemoryPower.NAME: Diligence
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, retain #b

stsjorbsmod:LustMemoryPower.NAME: Lust
DESCRIPTIONS: % bonus damage. When you forget Lust, gain #b

stsjorbsmod:PatienceMemoryPower.NAME: Patience
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 #yCoil each time you play a card.
